title: My only complaint about Super Galaxy Kindred
body: My only problem is that the bow doesn't have a digital sound effect added to it, so it still sounds like there's a typical bow and arrow, and no cool techno noise to match the skin's theme.

replies.body: We added in a bit of new sounds (not entirely new) to the (E) and the (R), in addition to the (W) already having a new sound. Keep in mind that she is a 975 RP skin, so a new full set of audio is not something this particular skin would receive.

>Keep in mind that **she**

le gasp
Ok well add sounds and increase to 1350.

> [{quoted}](name=Blainezy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=K2F04q9p,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-05-05T18:29:37.817+0000)
>
> Ok well add sounds and increase to 1350.

See this is what simple logic says to do, but riot seems to have some behind the scenes price scheduling agenda plan nonsense restraining the skins team that essentially locks skins into price points.

Same thing happened with sweet heart annie, people were like give it pink fire and make it 975. Riot said no and released what I consider to be an unfinished skin at 750, but had the nads to give secret agent xin a recall animation and briefcases after his ult and call it 975.

Having a normal bow twang on a technological lazer bow just sounds bad, you guys have have to be able to complete the skin even if it raises the price point.

> See this is what simple logic says to do, but riot seems to have some behind the scenes price scheduling agenda plan nonsense restraining the skins team that essentially locks skins into price points.

We aren't always locked into price points. We may have an idea that we consider a 1350 RP, and then decide to push it to 975 RP or 1820 RP. Mecha Zero Sion was actually originally a 1350 RP skin, but we felt we could push it to something even better - new VO, animations, particles, etc., to really fulfill the fantasy. 

In the case of Sweetheart Annie, she was just meant to be dressed up, which is why we didn't feel particle work was necessary.

Which is cool , but why not just listen to community ideas? Of course I'm also not a art concept expert. Idk how much work it would actually take to make the fire pink, but I feel like it would have sold much more if the people wanted it more than anything else on that skin. 

I would just ask to consider adding the sounds to the bows and arrows . I'd even totally be fine with a delay of the skin just for it. The others are 1350 and 1820.. Poor kindred :(

We do listen to community ideas pretty often! In fact, we did take yours (and other players feedback) and add more sounds to Super Galaxy Kindred!  :) The launch missile for the AAs have audio on them now - as well as SFX for other skills, as opposed to just bits and pieces of the kit. Kindred has been changed to be a 1350 RP skin.
Yes I saw that and made another post about it thanking you guys! You're the best!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=K2F04q9p,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-05T20:09:25.310+0000)
>
> We aren't always locked into price points. We may have an idea that we consider a 1350 RP, and then decide to push it to 975 RP or 1820 RP. Mecha Zero Sion was actually originally a 1350 RP skin, but we felt we could push it to something even better - new VO, animations, particles, etc., to really fulfill the fantasy. 
> 
> In the case of Sweetheart Annie, she was just meant to be dressed up, which is why we didn't feel particle work was necessary.

Welp problem solved, thanks for getting back to us

What I wouldn't give to understand the inner machinations of Riot, so some skins need to be at price points for some reason or another.  I can only imagine how constraining that might be for the artists/concept people, good on you guys for delivering quality work most people love.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

It's a case by case basis! :) It depends on what the thematic needs.

A good example of what we changed recently was Super Galaxy Kindred. Originally the skin was 975 RP, but due to player feedback, we added a new suite of sounds and bumped the skin up to 1350 RP. We agreed that a new set of sounds was needed to complete the skin!
They dont need to change the sounds, id gladly pay 1350 for this skin just for the colors alone i love it, new favorite ski

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=K2F04q9p,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-05T17:30:52.063+0000)
>
> Keep in mind that _**they**_ are a 975 RP skin

FTFY
Thank you for the Red Response! :D But I think the skin will see a lot more popularity if that sound effect (or sound effects) are included, even if it forces the price up to 1350.

I do believe the missile for the auto attacks will be adjusted. I can verify.

**EDIT:** New sounds for the missile launch of the auto attack.

Thanks for the continued response, I'm just trying to speak as a player. These small changes do go noticed, such as the 'crackle' on the Firecracker Jinx auto-attack, these noises make every attack feel so much satisfying and I think it'll tie the theme together more.
Totally understandable. :)

Not going to ask when because I know it is subject to change and if you saw them because no kindred main would allow you to not know of their existence. But for any of the very well done fan concepts, as a request could we see one of them be made into a skin in the future for kindred?

It's entirely possible! We have used community work before - just as Pool Party Ziggs. As for community concepts for Kindred, I'm pretty fond of the Elderwood idea floating around. As a note, we do have a folder that we keep awesome community concepts that we find, and we do bring them out when looking into giving x champion a new skin!
Can I pressure you to make Elderwood Karthus real? :P
I can certainly suggest it! :)

I thought you were in the job of making skins feel coherent? Kindred's autoattacks sound and feel weird in the Super Galaxy skin, and I would gladly pay extraRP for that alone. I will not be buying this skin if it does not get that fix.

Besides, adding the same filter you have on her E for the skin to her autos takes virtually no time at all.

I do work on skins, yes. 

For sounds, it's not a filter, but rather processing, which means editing the sound itself, rather than just applying a filter over an existing line.

Kindred will have the launch missile sound changed for the auto attack.
Thank you very much! I'm sorry for getting a bit pissy, I've not been having the best day.
No worries at all! Hope you're doing better! ^-^
I dont think you need to add new sounds! Id gladly pay 1350 rp just for the colors ot involves! Cant wait for it to come out! Buying it right away!

Personally i would spend 1350rp on this skin just for the way ot looks wothout new sounds, this is my favorite skin in league of legends i cant wait for it to come out, im buying it right away no matter the price. I think the colors are awesome for it! So psyched!

I personally don't like the Skin :/ 

Like I guess this is supposed to be a "fun" skin, but my god it doesn't suit Death in my eyes.
Omg, this is the only problem I had with SG Kindred also. I'm so glad they changed the AA sfx, even if that meant ypinh the price :)
Hm. That is definitely a problem. Sound is important.
There are a few other new sound effects I believe, but the auto is obviously the one you'll be hearing the most. Just seems unfitting to not be changed.
175% agreed.
